title: The Skies Of Valhalla Fantasy Adventure Music Pack
description: This is a music pack featuring 43 fantasy instrumental tracks. Utilizing orchestral effects, all of these pieces are versatile enough to use across a wide variety of projects.
longDescription:
Music composer, Living Force is proud to present The Skies of Valhalla Music Pack! This is an asset pack that contains 43 orchestral instrumentals geared towards the world of fantasy. The pieces all contain a fade-out and are loopable for desired cut scenes, action sequences, and transitions for your projects.

Sacred Journey

Shadows For Dust And Glory

Solitude

Spirit Of Fire

The Calvary Approaches

The Evening Watch

The Fleet Arrives

The Frontier Awaits

The Kingdom

The Knight's Pledge

The Queen Ascends

The Realm Of Peace

The Relentless Battle

The Rites Of Passage

The Skies Of Valhalla

Two Armies Enter Only One Survives

Unforgotten

Urgent

Warlock
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Wavs: 43

Number of Audio Cues: 43

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz

Does music loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 1 Hour 45 Minutes

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
